channel.title: Portforwarding! Still need help! Read edit of first post and my last post!
channel.description: Does portforwarding really not damage my internet? I need an 13174716419467916598716583465% right answer. If my internet damages when i portforward, then portforwarding would be the last thing i did. Lol. J/K. But please answer!! And does my internet slow down if people join my private server?

item.title: Portforwarding! Still need help! Read edit of first post and my last post!
item.dc:creator: @_Charlie `Charlie_
item.description:
@_Charlie wrote:

It doesn’t damage your internet. Your internet shouldn’t really slow down if you have people on your server, it might if you have a laggy server and lots of players though. I’m not sure.

If you’re too scared to touch your router settings or don’t want your internet to be slowed down, buy a VPS to run your server.

Read full topic

Ok not if you do it right, the only thing that might mess up is the static ip but that is easy to fix, so no it doesn’t
[/quote]
It would be fine if u told HOW TO fix.[/quote]
Set back to default settings
